message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,750,000. It's a great deal considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $1,250,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $1,250,000 is a bit too low for me.  Considering the significant value this product brings to your business, I'm willing to come down to $1,600,000. This allows for a fair deal for both of us. Let's make this happen!

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $1,450,000 for the product. I believe this strikes a good balance between our interests.
